div.p: COMFORTED. AND LAST NIGHT WE UNVEILED A NEW
POLL. SIMPLE QUESTION, DO YOU SUPPORT
THE LEGALIZATION OF POT? WELL, SOON AFTER WE ANNOUNCED
IT, A WEBSITE CALLED "READ IT" URGED ITS READERS TO FLOOD
SO THE POLL IS NOW POLLUTED. THIS HAPPENS ALL THE TIME.
LAST YEAR, AFTER I CRITICIZED RON PAUL, HIS ZEALOTS TRASHED
THE BOOK. BECAUSE SOME OF THE PAUL PEOPLE
TOLD THEM TO. BE SKEPTICAL OF WHAT YOU SEE ON
THE NET. IT IS ALMOST ALWAYS DRIVEN BY
SOME KIND OF AGENDA. SORRY ABOUT THE POLL, MAYBE
WE’LL RE-READ THE QUESTION AND TRY AGAIN.
AND THANK YOU FOR JOINING US, DIFFERENT FROM BILLO’REILLY.COM,
